thread.title: Illegal Alien Who Was Supposed To Be Deported Involved In Brutal Rape Of 14-Year-Old
thread.title_full: Illegal Alien Who Was Supposed To Be Deported Involved In Brutal Rape Of 14-Year-Old

author: Kim Smith
title: Illegal Alien Who Was Supposed To Be Deported Involved In Brutal Rape Of 14-Year-Old

organizations.name: montgomery county police department special victims investigations division

text:
3 Texas Fisherman Shot at Border… Cartel Gunmen Suspected 
The victim, who was not identified, told authorities that she was walking in a hallway of Rockville High School on Thursday about 9 a.m. when Sanchez and Montano approached her, according to a police report. 
The girl told police Montano asked for sex, which she refused, the report stated. She said he then forced her into a stall inside a boys’ bathroom where he and Sanchez repeatedly raped her and forced her to perform oral sex. 
Detectives from the Montgomery County Police Department Special Victims Investigations Division arrested Sanchez and Montano after the victim reported the incident to authorities. Advertisement - story continues below 
An investigation of the bathroom by forensic experts revealed blood “that may be mixed with male fluid,” the police report stated. 
The Washington Post reported that a U.S. Border Patrol agent in Texas picked up Sanchez seven months ago, when it was determined he had entered the country illegally. ICE lodged an immigration detainer against Sanchez. 
Jessica Vaughn, director of Policy Studies for the Center for Immigration Studies in Washington, told Fox News that the “surge” of illegal aliens arriving in the county was partly to blame for the crime. 
“The surge of Central American kids has become a significant problem in many of the school districts where they are allowed to resettle,” she said. Advertisement - story continues below
